item.title: Openai GPT Prompt 官方教程
item.description: openai官方教程(六大策略) Six strategies for getting better results 一、Write clear instructions Include details in your query to get more relevant answers 在你的问题中包含细节，以获得更相关的答案 bad good Who’s president? Who was the president of Mexico in 2021, and how frequently are elections held? Write code to calculate the Fibonacci sequence. Write a TypeScript function to efficiently calculate the Fibonacci sequence. Comment the code liberally to explain what each piece does and why it’s written that way.
